trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to an ASP.NET user control's output cache settings.
trans-unit.target: 提供對 ASP.NET 使用者控制項輸出快取設定的程式設計存取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class is used by developers in programmatic user control scenarios to specify output caching settings for user controls (.ascx files).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>類別可由開發人員以程式設計方式的使用者控制案例來指定使用者控制項 （.ascx 檔案） 的輸出快取設定。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET embeds user controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> instance.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會內嵌在使用者控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> class represents a user control that has output caching enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>類別表示已啟用快取輸出的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you access the <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control, you will always receive a valid <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: 當您存取<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>控制項，您就一定會收到有效<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, if you access the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> control, you receive a valid <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object only if the user control is already wrapped by a <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您存取<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>控制項，您會收到有效<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件如果使用者控制項已包裝的<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If it is not wrapped, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object returned by the property will throw exceptions when you attempt to manipulate it because it does not have an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不會經過包裝，<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>屬性所傳回的物件將會擲回例外狀況，當您嘗試處理它，因為它並沒有相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> instance supports caching without generating exceptions, inspect the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SupportsCaching%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>執行個體支援快取而不會產生例外狀況中，檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SupportsCaching%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class is one of several ways you can enable output caching.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>類別是下列其中一種您可以啟用輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching:
trans-unit.target: 下列清單描述您可用來啟用輸出快取的方法：

trans-unit.source: Use the directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用輸出快取在宣告式的情況下，使用指示詞。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> attribute to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>啟用快取做為程式碼後置檔案中的使用者控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> instances that have been cache-enabled using one of the previous methods and dynamically loaded using the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.LoadControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>類別，以指定您正在使用的程式設計案例中的快取設定<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>已啟用快取使用其中一個先前的方法並使用動態載入的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.LoadControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> instance can be successfully manipulated only between the `Init` and `PreRender` stages of the control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>執行個體可以成功操作只之間`Init`和`PreRender`控制項生命週期的階段。

trans-unit.source: If you modify a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object after the `PreRender` phase, ASP.NET throws an exception, because any changes made after the control is rendered cannot actually affect cache settings (a control is cached during the `Render` stage).
trans-unit.target: 如果您修改<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件之後`PreRender`階段中，ASP.NET 擲回例外狀況，因為要呈現控制項之後，進行任何變更無法實際上會影響快取設定 (控制項在快取`Render`階段)。

trans-unit.source: Finally, a user control instance (and therefore its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object) is only available for programmatic manipulation when it is actually rendered.
trans-unit.target: 最後，使用者控制項執行個體 (因此其<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件) 時，才可供以程式設計方式操作它實際上會轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範可以如何動態載入和執行階段以程式設計方式管理的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>屬性會套用至使用者控制項，名為`SimpleControl`，這表示使用者控制項包裝<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>控制項在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object, which is available through a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control that wraps it.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleControl`物件的快取設定可以透過程式設計方式是透過與其相關聯操作<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件，可透過參考<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>包裝它的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A> property is examined during page initialization and changed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A> methods if some conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A>屬性會在頁面初始化和變更使用期間檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>方法必須符合某些條件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the `SimpleControl` user control from a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`SimpleControl`從 Web Form 網頁的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: To run this example successfully, make sure the user control file (.ascx), its code-behind file (.cs or .vb), and the Web Forms page that hosts the user control (.aspx) are in the same directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功執行此範例，請確定使用者控制項檔案 (.ascx)、 （.cs 或.vb），其程式碼後置檔案和 Web Form 網頁裝載使用者控制項 (.aspx) 相同的目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether fragment caching is enabled for the user control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用使用者控制項的片段快取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user control's output is cached; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果快取使用者控制項的輸出，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Cached" /> property is set outside of the initialization and rendering stages of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Cached" /> 屬性是在控制項的初始化和呈現階段以外設定的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> class associated with the cached user control output.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> 類別的執行個體，而該執行個體是與已快取的使用者控制項輸出相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Dependency%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl.Dependency%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> control that wraps the user control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Dependency%2A>屬性委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl.Dependency%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>包裝使用者控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> instance is invalidated, the user control is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>無效執行個體、 從快取移除的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Dependency" /> property is set outside of the initialization and rendering stages of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Dependency" /> 屬性是在控制項的初始化和呈現階段以外設定的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time that cached items are to remain in the output cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定快取項目保留在輸出快取中的時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the amount of time a user control is to remain in the output cache.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，表示使用者控制項保留在輸出快取中的時間。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: If an absolute expiration policy is set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A> property returns the amount of time remaining until cache entry expiration.
trans-unit.target: 如果絕對期限原則設定使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A>方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A>屬性會傳回快取項目到期前的剩餘的時間量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範可以如何動態載入和執行階段以程式設計方式管理的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means it is wrapped by a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>屬性會套用至使用者控制項，名為`SimpleControl`，這表示它所包裝<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>控制項在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object, which is available through a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control that wraps it.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleControl`物件的快取設定可以透過程式設計方式是透過與其相關聯操作<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件，可透過參考<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>包裝它的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A> property is examined during page initialization and cache expiration is changed if some conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A>屬性會檢查頁面的初始化期間，如果符合某些條件變更快取逾期。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>類別。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration" /> property is set outside of the initialization and rendering stages of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration" /> 屬性是在控制項的初始化和呈現階段以外設定的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the output-cache provider that is associated with a control instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與控制項執行個體相關聯的輸出快取區提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.ProviderName%2A> property enables you to specify the current output-cache provider that is associated with a control, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.ProviderName%2A>屬性可讓您指定目前的輸出快取提供者所關聯之控制項時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event occurs in the control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定只之前<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>控制項生命週期發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The provider name was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.ProviderName" /> property during or after the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.ProviderName" /> 事件發生期間或之後，設定 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> after which the cached entry expires.
trans-unit.target: 快取項目到期的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> control that wraps the user control to expire the cache entry at the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 指示包裝使用者控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 控制項，讓快取項目在指定日期和時間到期。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A> methods (passing `true`) to instruct the <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> control that wraps the user control to use a sliding expiration caching policy instead of an absolute expiration policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A>方法 (傳遞`true`) 指示<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>包裝使用滑動期限，快取原則，而不是絕對期限原則的使用者控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A> method (passing `false`) to specify an absolute expiration policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A>方法 (傳遞`false`) 來指定絕對期限原則。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範可以如何動態載入和執行階段以程式設計方式管理的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>屬性會套用至使用者控制項，名為`SimpleControl`，這表示使用者控制項包裝<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>控制項在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object, which is available through a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control that wraps it.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleControl`物件的快取設定可以透過程式設計方式是透過與其相關聯操作<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件，可透過參考<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>包裝它的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A> property is examined during page initialization and changed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A> methods if some conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.Duration%2A>屬性會在頁面初始化和變更使用期間檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>方法必須符合某些條件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>類別。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use sliding cache expiration instead of absolute expiration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用滑動期限快取，取代絕對期限，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> control that wraps the user control to set the user control's cache entry to use sliding or absolute expiration.
trans-unit.target: 指示包裝使用者控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 控制項，將使用者控制項的快取項目設定成使用滑動期限或絕對期限。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A> methods (passing `true`) to instruct the <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> control that wraps the user control to use a sliding expiration caching policy instead of an absolute expiration policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A>方法 (傳遞`true`) 指示<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>包裝使用滑動期限，快取原則，而不是絕對期限原則的使用者控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A> method (passing `false`) to specify an absolute expiration policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetExpires%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration%2A>方法 (傳遞`false`) 來指定絕對期限原則。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範可以如何動態載入和執行階段以程式設計方式管理的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: A user control named `SimpleControl` is decorated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> attribute, which means it is wrapped by a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，名為`SimpleControl`以裝飾<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>屬性，這表示它所包裝<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>控制項在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object, which is available through a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> control that wraps it.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleControl`物件的快取設定可以透過程式設計方式是透過與其相關聯操作<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>物件，可透過參考<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>包裝它的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, caching settings are examined during page initialization and changed if some conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，快取設定為檢查頁面的初始化期間，而且如果符合某些條件變更。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy>類別。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。

trans-unit.source: The list of custom strings.
trans-unit.target: 自訂字串的清單。

trans-unit.source: Sets a list of custom strings that the output cache will use to vary the user control.
trans-unit.target: 設定輸出快取用來變更使用者控制項的自訂字串清單。

trans-unit.source: If you pass "browser" as the `varyByCustom` parameter, the user control will be varied by browser type and major version number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 「 瀏覽器 」 當做`varyByCustom`參數，使用者控制項將不同的瀏覽器類型和主要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: If another custom string is entered, you must override the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.GetVaryByCustomString%2A> method in your application's Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入另一個自訂的字串，則您必須覆寫<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.GetVaryByCustomString%2A>應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user control supports caching.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者控制項是否支援快取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user control supports caching; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者控制項支援快取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A user control supports caching if it is associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> instance, which signals that either an directive was parsed by the ASP.NET parser or the user control was decorated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果與相關聯的快取的使用者控制項支援<xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl>執行個體，以指示是指示詞已剖析 ASP.NET 剖析器，或使用者控制項以裝飾<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of control identifiers to vary the cached output by.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制識別項清單，用來變更快取輸出。

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary a user control's output cache.
trans-unit.target: 用來變更使用者控制項輸出快取的分號分隔字串清單。

trans-unit.source: These strings represent the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property values of ASP.NET server controls declared in the user control.
trans-unit.target: 這些字串表示使用者控制項中宣告之 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.VaryByControl" /> property is set outside of the initialization and rendering stages of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.VaryByControl" /> 屬性是在控制項的初始化和呈現階段以外設定的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of <see langword="GET" /> or <see langword="POST" /> parameter names to vary the cached output by.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see langword="GET" /> 或 <see langword="POST" /> 參數名稱清單，用來變更快取輸出。

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary the output cache.
trans-unit.target: 用來變更輸出快取的分號分隔的字串清單。

trans-unit.source: By default, these strings correspond to a query string value sent with the GET method or to a parameter sent using the POST method.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這些字串會對應至 GET 方法以傳送的查詢字串值或傳送使用 POST 方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.VaryByParams%2A> property is set to multiple parameters, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy.VaryByParams%2A>屬性設定為多個參數，輸出快取包含要求的文件的不同版本，每個指定參數。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include "none", "*", and any valid query string or POST parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括 "none"、"*"，以及任何有效的查詢字串，或 POST 參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user control is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> and is not cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl" /> 沒有關聯，也不能快取。
